text: == Intro to -2 == -2 is a negative integer between −1and -3. It's bigger than -3 and less than -1(-3>-2>-1.) == Its square,cube,square root,cube root, and factorial == square of -2:-4 cube of -2:-8 square root of -2:1.41421356 i cube root of -2:-1.25992104989 factorial of -2:-2 -2 Category:Negative integers
title: −2 (number)
